glottospace 0.0.113
  • Reference

Recode missing values to NA

Source: R/glottoclean.R
glottorecode_missing.Rd

Recode missing values to NA

glottorecode_missing(glottodata, tona)

Arguments

glottodata

glottodata

tona

Optional, additional values to recode to NA

Examples

glottodata <- glottoget("demodata", meta = TRUE)
glottorecode_missing(glottodata, tona = "?")
#> Missing values recoded to NA 
#>   glottocode var001 var002 var003
#> 1   yucu1253      Y      a      N
#> 2   tani1257   <NA>      b      Y
#> 3   ticu1245      Y      a      Y
#> 4   orej1242      N      b      N
#> 5   nade1244      N      c      Y
#> 6   mara1409      N      a      N

glottosubdata <- glottoget("demosubdata", meta = TRUE)
glottorecode_missing(glottosubdata, tona = "?")
#> Missing values recoded to NA 
#>      glottosubcode var001 var002 var003
#> 1  yucu1253_a_0001      Y      a      Y
#> 2  yucu1253_a_0002      N      b      N
#> 3  yucu1253_a_0003      Y      a      N
#> 4  yucu1253_a_0004      N      b      Y
#> 5  yucu1253_a_0005      Y      a   <NA>
#> 6  yucu1253_b_0001      N      b      Y
#> 7  yucu1253_b_0002      Y      a      N
#> 8  yucu1253_b_0003      N      b      N
#> 9  yucu1253_b_0004      Y      a      Y
#> 10 yucu1253_b_0005      N      b   <NA>
#> 11 tani1257_a_0001      Y      a      N
#> 12 tani1257_a_0002   <NA>      a      Y
#> 13 tani1257_a_0003      Y      a      N
#> 14 tani1257_a_0004      Y      b      Y
#> 15 tani1257_a_0005      N      b      N
#> 16 tani1257_b_0001      Y      a      Y
#> 17 tani1257_b_0002   <NA>      a      N
#> 18 tani1257_b_0003      Y      a      Y
#> 19 tani1257_b_0004      Y      b      N
#> 20 tani1257_b_0005      N      b      Y
